about_the_game:
A gridy and boxy sandbox tile set!
This is a casual re-adaptation of "Grid Map Tile Collection Pro", made specifically for RPG Maker users!
You can create various terrains from grasslands to deserts, as well as villages and towns!

Contents
◆characters：24 character images such as door openings and closings, bonfires, treasure chests, etc.
◆plugins：1 plugin to animate plugins A tile C block
◆tilesets：27 tilesets image files for creating grassland, sand, wasteland, snow, caves, villages, and cities.
◆SampleGame：One RPG Maker MZ/MV sample game data.

-----

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

A gridy and boxy sandbox tile set!
This is a casual re-adaptation of "Grid Map Tile Collection Pro", made specifically for RPG Maker users!
You can create various terrains from grasslands to deserts, as well as villages and towns!

Contents
◆characters：24 character images such as door openings and closings, bonfires, treasure chests, etc.
◆plugins：1 plugin to animate plugins A tile C block
◆tilesets：27 tilesets image files for creating grassland, sand, wasteland, snow, caves, villages, and cities.
◆SampleGame：One RPG Maker MZ/MV sample game data.

-----

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
